name: Virtual Realiburger Demo Bundle
description:
A bundle of games and demos created by the University of Washington Game Development Club featured at the "Virtal Realiburger" showcase at Caliburger on January 27th, 2017. All money raised will go to the club to help fund future events and activities (such as their endless endevour to get a private game dev island).

Support and follow the members of the club:
Nick Kaman (@SmashyNick): https://namsang.itch.io/
Jose Pacio (@ImPACIOble)
Andrew Murray (@FlameFrog_Games): https://flamefrog.itch.io/
[If you want to recieve updates to Super Dunkman, buy the full version at https://flamefrog.itch.io/superdunkman]
Kenji Goodson: https://thenewfairybook.itch.io/
